suggestions.reasoning: Lowering confluence_gap_min from 30 to 22 (below the 25.1 average of missed trades) and confluence_score_min to 25 should capture more profitable opportunities. Expanding volume_requirement to include 'normal' addresses the 13% of missed trades that weren't high volume. Implementing staged profit-taking (1.5%, 3.5%, 6.5%) instead of single exits should reduce the 1.53% average left on table from early exits. The tight 0.8% stop loss maintains the excellent 0.01% max drawdown while allowing more trade entries.

Lower confluence thresholds (25 vs 30) align with missed trade averages. Expanded volume requirements capture 'normal' volume trades that may still be profitable. Tiered profit-taking (25% at each level) addresses early exits by letting 25% ride longer. Stop loss at 1.5% maintains favorable risk/reward while your max drawdown of 0.01% suggests you can handle slightly more risk for better capture.

Lower confluence requirements (20 vs 30 gap, 25 vs 30 score) will capture more trades since missed trades averaged 25.1 gap. Expanding volume to include 'normal' captures the 13% of missed trades with high volume. Multi-level profit taking (15%/35%/60%) addresses early exits by taking partial profits while letting winners run. 8% stop loss balances the 0.01% max drawdown with room for normal volatility.

Lowering confluence thresholds from 30 to 25 should capture the missed trades (avg gap 25.1). Expanding volume requirements to include 'normal' addresses the 13% high volume condition. Implementing tiered take profits with partial exits allows holding winners longer while protecting gains. The trailing approach reduces early exits that cost 1.53% avg per trade.

Lower confluence thresholds to capture missed trades (avg gap was 25.1 vs current 30 min), expand volume requirements to include normal volume since 13% of missed trades had high volume, implement tiered take profit levels to reduce early exits while protecting gains, and use a tight stop loss to maintain the excellent 0.01% max drawdown while allowing for more trade entries.
